description: We have separate galleries of TfL images available for use by the press and by companies and organisations connected to TfL.

texts: We have two main collections of TfL-related images that may help you.
Images in the TfL press image gallery are intended for use by the news media only.
These include images of various modes of transport, TfL services and members of the senior management team, all available in .jpeg format.
Images can be downloaded from the Flickr site: http://www.flickr.com/tflpress
Before downloading any of the images, please ensure you have read and will comply with TfL's copyright terms & conditions .

If you have any questions about the content on the site or the appropriate use of the images available, please contact the Press Office onÂ 0343 222 4141 ( TfL call charges ) or email us at pressoffice@tfl.gov.uk .
Our separate photo library is only available to authorised users - companies and individuals working for or on behalf of TfL.
